title: Importing to Typetool
content:
Iâ€™m exporting glyphs from CorelDraw, and importing them to Typetool 1.3. Any glyph with a counter gets cleaved down the middle into multiple adjacent shapes. How do I prevent this?

EDIT: Found workaround, exporting inside and outside paths as separate files. Not that this interests anyone.
author: cerulean
